lead_paragraph: As part of a rebuild, San Diego sent Upton, who is in the middle of a big season, and cash to Toronto for the minor league right-hander Hansel Rodriguez.

headline.print_headline: Rebuilding Padres Part Ways With Upton
headline.main: Padres Trade Outfielder Melvin Upton Jr. to the Blue Jays

snippet: As part of a rebuild, San Diego sent Upton, who is in the middle of a big season, and cash to Toronto for the minor league right-hander Hansel Rodriguez....
